actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited additional tax credit for political contributions to candidates for Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an additional income tax credit for political contributions to candidates for Congress in the district where the taxpayer lives. Limits the amount of such credit to $10 ($20 for joint returns) for each candidate to whom a contribution is made.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited additional tax credit for political contributions to candidates for Congress.
